page.title: 08Hotel Industry
page.content: This is the only hotel in the area.It was built at the beginning of this century to encourage people to come to Orkney for the excellent trout fishing.Today the hotel has 20 rooms and a maximum of 33 people can be accommodated.Of the guests who stay here 50% come for fishing and 50% for family holidays.Most of the guests book directly and in advance.Few people book through the local tourist office. The busiest months are between Easter and August when the hotel employs 6 people.In the winter months only two people are employed. Few people stay during the winter months. At this time of year the hotelier earns his income from the bar and bar meals.
